name: dick hurtz
text: super tasty, super thick pizza. just what i like! only had to wait 8 minutes. plus it was super clean inside. i wish i had one closer to me though. i dont live in poughkeepsie, where this place is located. they closed the one i am near like 3 years ago.

Turn back the hands of time this place is in need of a renovation.   Nice staff good food but the condition of the dining room makes me concerned about the kitchen..
